mapper.insert: INSERT INTO in_photos ( iphoto_filename, iphoto_extension, iphoto_uploaded_at, iphoto_project_id, iphoto_review_id ) VALUES ( #{iphotoFilename}, #{iphotoExtension}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{iphotoProjectId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iphotoReviewId, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT iphoto_id, iphoto_filename, iphoto_extension, iphoto_uploaded_at, iphoto_project_id, iphoto_review_id FROM in_photos WHERE iphoto_project_id = #{iphotoProjectId}
SELECT iphoto_id, iphoto_project_id, iphoto_review_id, iphoto_filename, iphoto_extension, iphoto_uploaded_at FROM in_photos WHERE iphoto_review_id = #{iphotoReviewId}
